renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)    mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                // rotation                  
#define penta(q)  length(q.xz)*cos( mod( atan(q.z,q.x)-.628 , 6.28/5. ) -.628 +vec2(0,11) ) // 5-fold symmetry
                                                              // crown of crystals
#define crown(q,a,l,r)  d = q, d.xz = penta(d),                     \
                        d.xy *= rot(-a), d.y -= l,                  \
                        t = min(t, penta(d).x + max(0.,.4*d.y) - r ) // one crystal
                       
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,s,m=t; 
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -3.5*R.y) - R),             // ray direction
          p = 7./R, q,d,                                      // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5: vec3(20,2,0)/1e2*cos(.2*iTime+vec3(0,11,0)); // auto thumbnail
     
    for (O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01)
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(.5-6.*M.y),                               // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(2.-6.*M.x),
        q.y++,
        t = min(t, s = q.y),                                  // floor
        t = min(t, penta(q).x + max(0.,.4*q.y-.4) - .15 ),    // central peak
        crown(q, .5,1.,.1),                                   // top crown 
        q.xz *= rot(.63), crown(q, .8,.8,.1),                 // bottom crown
        m = min(m,t),                                         // for glow
        p += .5*t*D;                                          // step forward = dist to obj          

    O *= t==s ? vec4(.4) : vec4(.7,.9,1,1);                   // color scheme
    O += exp2(-m) * vec4(.7,.9,1,1) *(1.+sin(3.*iTime))/4.;   // glow
}
